unnormalised: The IPL auction just wrapped up, and honestly, some teams seem to be operating on a different plane. Delhi Capitals shelled out Rs. 17.5 crore for that Aussie pacer – seventeen and a half, can you believe it? My chai cost just Rs. 10 this morning, which puts things into perspective, doesn't it? Guess I'll be sticking to tapri ki chai for the foreseeable future.
normalised: The I-P-L auction just wrapped up, and honestly, some teams seem to be operating on a different plane. Delhi Capitals shelled out rupee seventeen point five crore for that Aussie pacer – seventeen and a half, can you believe it? My chai cost just rupee ten this morning, which puts things into perspective, doesn't it? Guess I'll be sticking to tapri ki chai for the foreseeable future.

unnormalised: Mumbai Indians, on the other hand, went bargain hunting, picking up a spinner for a cool Rs. 20 lakh. That's like finding a twenty-rupee note in your old jeans pocket – a pleasant surprise, but hardly a game-changer. Still, 20 lakh is 20 lakh; maybe they'll use the saved cash to buy Rohit Sharma an extra vada pav. It couldn't hurt.
normalised: Mumbai Indians, on the other hand, went bargain hunting, picking up a spinner for a cool rupee twenty lakh. That's like finding a twenty-rupee note in your old jeans pocket – a pleasant surprise, but hardly a game-changer. Still, twenty lakh is twenty lakh; maybe they'll use the saved cash to buy Rohit Sharma an extra vada pav. It couldn't hurt.

unnormalised: And let's not forget the Rajasthan Royals, who snagged a middle-order batsman for Rs. 8 crore. EIGHT! Crores! I could buy, like, 80,000 samosas with that kind of money. Priorities, people! Maybe they're planning a post-match samosa party for the whole team. Now THAT'S a winning strategy.
normalised: And let's not forget the Rajasthan Royals, who snagged a middle-order batsman for rupee eight crore. EIGHT! Crores! I could buy, like, eighty thousand samosas with that kind of money. Priorities, people! Maybe they're planning a post-match samosa party for the whole team. Now THAT'S a winning strategy.

unnormalised: In other news, the commentators are predicting a high-scoring season. Expect scores to reach 220+, with sixes flying out of the stadium like confetti. And remember, folks, all stats are subject to change, especially after a few strategic timeouts and some well-placed divine intervention. After all, this is India, anything can happen!
normalised: In other news, the commentators are predicting a high-scoring season. Expect scores to reach two hundred and twenty plus, with sixes flying out of the stadium like confetti. And remember, folks, all stats are subject to change, especially after a few strategic timeouts and some well-placed divine intervention. After all, this is India, anything can happen!
